title: Your stars today
text:
See what the stars have in store for you today.

FRIDAY OCTOBER 18, 2019

ARIES March 21-April 20 ***

Today’s stars charge up your Aries enthusiasm and spontaneity even more than usual. Make it a priority to follow through on any promises or commitments you make to family, friends or neighbours.

TAURUS April 21-May 21 ***

Creativity is high and you’re keen to show others what you are really capable of. Do your best to keep your feet on the ground today Taurus, especially when it comes to financial matters.

GEMINI May 22-June 21 ***

The Moon moves through your sign which highlights your curious, restless and adaptable side. So make sure you schedule plenty of stimulating activities to keep you interested today Twins.

CANCER June 22-July 23 ***

Are you dealing with a very unpredictable situation? Use your imagination to come up with a fresh approach to an old problem. Plus pay close attention to the messages in your nightly dreams.

LEO July 24-Aug 23 **

Stubbornly sticking to a set point of view will get you nowhere fast today Cats – especially with close friends. Whereas a flexible and fun attitude will make the day run a lot more smoothly.

VIRGO Aug 24-Sep 23 ***

Some Virgos will feel very restless today. So find challenging and creative ways to amuse and occupy yourself. Kindness and compassion will take you far, especially with work colleagues.

LIBRA Sep 24-Oct 23 ***

The more creative and cooperative you are, the better the day will be. The stars also encourage you to have ambitious aspirations, as you tap into exciting ideas from a stimulating new source.

SCORPIO Oct 24-Nov 22 **

You think you’ve got the answers but a current problem is much more complicated than appears on the surface. It’s definitely not black and white. There are many shades of grey in between.

SAGITTARIUS Nov 23-Dec 21 ***

It’s a great day to do what you do so well – talk, laugh and joke with family and friends. Just make sure you are gregarious rather than garrulous; and stimulating rather than superficial!

CAPRICORN Dec 22-Jan 20 ***

Use your earthy Capricorn energy in different ways today, so you don’t end up getting bored. Set yourself a challenge as you take a cherished dream and gradually spin it into rock-solid reality.

AQUARIUS Jan 21-Feb 19 ***

You’re feeling inspired, as you come up with a creative way to fix an annoying old problem. Make sure you socialise with friends who celebrate your idiosyncrasies and encourage your dreams.

PISCES Feb 20-March 20 ***

It’s a good day for joint ventures, as you use a combination of charm and chutzpah to get what you want … in the most delightful way. Plus do your best to calm down a stressed family member.

Copyright Joanne Madeline Moore 2019
description: See what the stars have in store for you today.
